messages.subject: Re: 2225 teacher
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/10/02 11:42 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote: ... Ned can t help himself: First, are you quoting someone
messages.messageBody:
on 8/10/02 11:42 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

"gruvystarchild" wrote:
> Subject: christianity
>
> " One who does not unschool cannot
> possibly teach about it, he can teach about what he
> knows from a book or from what others have told him
> but not from his own experience. Someone who is not a
> parent cannot possibly write a book on parenting until
> he walks the walk of a parent such can be said for any
> belief."

Ned can't help himself:
First, are you quoting someone else or yourself?

Next, Have you heard of John Holt? I met John, heard him speak, read all his
books and have a lot in common with him (similar school/same college,
similar interests. I can say with deep conviction that he transformed my
life with his writings about education and children in general, even though
he never married and had no kids.

And then there's a guy they call Pope John who seems to know a little about
kids.

I appreciate many of your posts, but I don't get this one.

Ned Vare
"Don't let your schooling get in the way of your education." -- Mark Twain
